bibl.title: The Roman and Byzantine Army in the East. Proceedings of a Colloquium Held at the Jagiellonian University, Kraków in September 1992
bibl.note: The Problem. - Enlistment Dates of Soldiers on the Rosters for AD 219 and 222 [P. Dura 100-101 = Roman Mil. Rec. 1-2]. - Cyclical Discharge and Recruitment elsewhere.
